data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Debubawi Keyih Bahri, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Debubawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Debubawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary: On average, 169 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Debubawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 511,382 people in the state of Debubawi Keyih Bahri who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Debubawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Pour your Spirit out on the 1,060,800 citizens of Debubawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Debubawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea to the gospel today.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Debubawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea.
